attributes.action: Honour comedian Sarah Millican for her work to prevent isolation and loneliness
attributes.background: As a much loved British celebrity, Sarah has worked tirelessly to prevent Social Isolation via Social Media. Sarah launched, and encouraged lonely and isolated people, particularly around Christmas time to use the hashtag #joinin on Twitter - bringing joy and relief to those who need it most!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
